original_title: Myanmar has agreed to rescue the 56 Sri Lankans held against their will at a Cyber Slave Camp in Myawaddi by conducting an immediate operation
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Sri Lankan Ambassador to Myanmar, Janaka Bandara said that Myanmar has agreed to rescue the 56 Sri Lankans being held against their will in a cyber slave camp in Myawaddi, by conducting an immediate operation.

The Ambassador said there were positive responses in the discussions held between the Sri Lankan and Myanmar foreign ministers and between the BIMSTEC ambassadors and Myanmar's Deputy Foreign Minister.
